alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Boundary, west central Bonner and east central Pend Oreille Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 330 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Nordman, or 25 miles northwest of Priest River, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nordman, Browns Lake Campground, Ruby, and South Skookum Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
